content:
Himanshu Sekhar Nayak said:

Abhiram I saw your proposal and it is nice to see you have proposed the changes that you have found out. How about a small patch to showcase what you have proposed? This will increase your chance too.

I have a small concern here, if I'll have to showcase what I proposed i need to only send pr with very minor and small changes. If I'll have to make bigger changes I'll need to do it in systematic way and update chunks of the code base at once so that the application doesn't break and it runs properly (which translates to the proposed project itself)
Start with something as small as you can find but that is some actual improvement, or fix, etc
We just mostly want to see how you approach and discuss code, and your ability to read and modify existing code

If you really want to impress, make it directly related to your project in some manner, but it should be a complete and standalone change, not some work in progress. But still, any change that is “complete” however small will be better than a bigger change than it not, or worse no change demonstrated

Sean said:

We just mostly want to see how you approach and discuss code, and your ability to read and modify existing code

okayy! will do that at the earliest. Thank you
